duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform clinical specimen accessioning, sample sorting, and data entry according to established standard operating procedures.
Prepare laboratory specimens for analysis and testing, and pack and ship specimens to proper testing facilities.
Accurately identify and label specimens, and resolve and document any problem specimens.
Meet department activity and production goals, and properly prepare and store excess specimen samples.
Data entry of patient information in an accurate and timely manner, and unpack and route specimens to their respective staging areas.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (1-2 years of previous medical or production experience preferred)
